clues.clue: "I never believed in anything before I believed in movies", said this "E.T." director

Dutch-American artist about whose work the term "action painting" was coined

final_jeopardy.clue: Capt. Robert FitzRoy of this ship argued that its scientific discoveries supported the Bible
